it has as much point as the squire you suggested.

  1. The Squire helps BD, this neither helps or hinders anyone

  3. The Squire does not take a player out of the game for no reason

item.title: [Class suggestion] The Mimic
item.dc:creator: Alkander
item.description:
Whenever I think about new classes I ask myself, “What about this class would make me want to play it/ what is unique gameplay wise?”
So for this class, lets say I jump into the body of a Butler… what is different/ unique to that game than if I had started off as a Butler? You would have the ability to chose who to jump into… but in the big picture that doesnt affect anyone else, just kills the person in that body and now a new player is playing that class.
My 2 cents towards the class would be maybe have him be a neutral killer that can take on the identity of different Blue Dragons and have some sneaky way of killing people.

Read full topic
